    • Method Detail

      • loadGrid

        public void loadGrid(java.lang.String fileName)
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file containing the saved grid-state data. Sets the grid state based on the data in file.

      • loadGridFromLine

        public void loadGridFromLine(java.lang.String fileName,
                             int line)
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file containing the saved grid-state data.
        line - The line from which to consider the data from (indexed from 1). Sets the grid state based on the data in file.

      • resetUndoRedoSaveFile

        public void resetUndoRedoSaveFile()
        Resets save data.

      • recordReset

        public void recordReset()
        Records reset data to a file when a reset of the grid has occured.

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Undos the last operation. Operations that can be undone include toggling grid blocks, clearing grid blocks and loading in grid-states and instruments.

      • recordLoad

        public void recordLoad()
        Saves corresponding data when a load operation has occured. This is used for the undo and redo operations.

      • redo

        public void redo()
        Redos the last undo operation.

      • recordToggle

        public void recordToggle(int gridX,
                         int gridY)
        Saves toggle data.
        Parameters:
        gridX - The number of blocks to the right.
        gridY - The number of blocks down.

      • generateStateInfo

        public java.lang.String generateStateInfo()
        Returns:
        A string containing encoded information that describes the grid-state at the time of invocation.

      • getBlocks

        public Block[][] getBlocks()
        Returns:
        The Block objects stored in the grid.

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draws the static grid and the active blocks on it.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Graphic
        Parameters:
        app - The App object which has the GraphicsHandler object which stores the Graphic.

      • click

        public void click(App app)
        Toggles the state of the block on which the mouse coordinates are positioned at the time of click.
        Overrides:
        click in class Graphic
        Parameters:
        app - The App object which has the GraphicsHandler object which stores the Graphic.

      • deactivateGridBlocks

        public void deactivateGridBlocks()
        Sets the state of all blocks to inactive.

      • activateGridBlocks

        public void activateGridBlocks()
        Sets the state of all blocks to active.
